turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like to order I'd like to order a Starbucks from multiple Starbucks in Indianapolis.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande iced toasted white chocolate mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read that back to you to make sure i got it down correctly. you want a grande iced toasted white chocolate mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream from starbucks in Indianapolis.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $5.69 is the total. did you want me to process the payment now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I would love that. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. the drink will be ready for you in 10 minutes. the receipt has been sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're the best. No, you're the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: aw shucks, why thanks sir. you are the best.
